actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the cap on additional retired pay for extraordinary heroism for members of the Army and Air Force who served during the Vietnam Era.
short_title: Bobby Moran Soldierâ€™s Medal Retirement Act

summary.text:
Bobby Moran Soldier's Medal Retirement Act 

This bill removes the cap on additional retired pay for extraordinary heroism in the line of duty (during active duty service) for members of the Army and Air Force who served during the Vietnam Era (i.e., the period beginning August 5, 1964, and ending on March 27, 1973).
